ch0130_10_serena/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Looks like you’re
ready to take on anything today!
ch0130_10_serena/0101_0701_02_10:
I can tell because you’re really rocking your outfit!
It’s fantastic!
ch0130_10_serena/7101_0701_01_10:
When it comes to fashion, the possibilities are
endless! This outfit I’m wearing looks good, right?
Isn’t it awesome?
ch0130_10_serena/7101_0701_02_10:
When I wear something different, I feel different,
too! Right now, I feel super cool and put together!
ch0130_10_serena/7102_0701_01_10:
Zygarde is known to monitor people who might
try to destroy the ecosystem.
ch0130_10_serena/7102_0701_02_10:
But right now, it’s my partner Pokémon.
I like to think it’s watching over and
protecting me, too.
ch0130_10_serena/7103_0701_01_10:
Back in Kalos, there were people who called
themselves Team Flare.
ch0130_10_serena/7103_0701_02_10:
They tried to get rid of us and our Pokémon
because they only felt despair about the current
state of the world...
ch0130_10_serena/7103_0701_03_10:
But I don’t think the world is so bad that we have
to feel that kind of despair. Don’t you agree?
ch0130_10_serena/7104_0701_01_10:
In order to partner up with someone, you’ve got
to make sure you’re doing your best to be a good
match for them, too.
ch0130_10_serena/7104_0701_02_10:
The most important thing is what’s on the inside, of
course... But fashion matters, too, in my opinion.
ch0130_10_serena/7104_0701_03_10:
When your outfit looks messy, some
might say it’s a sign that your heart is
somewhere else.
ch0130_10_serena/7105_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]-kins!
Or do you prefer Li’l [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0130_10_serena/7105_0701_02_10:
Oh, you look confused. I thought I’d give you a
nickname so we can be even better friends!
ch0130_10_serena/7105_0701_03_10:
Giving your Pokémon a nickname can do
the same thing.
ch0130_10_serena/7105_0701_04_10:
Hm... Maybe I should let you decide what you
want your nickname to be, though.
ch0130_10_serena/1701_0701_01_10: I have a present for you! It’s really good!
ch0130_10_serena/1701_0702_01_10: Don’t be shy, now! Feel free to use it all up!
ch0130_10_serena/2501_0701_01_10:
I was never really a fan of doing something just
because other people are doing it.
ch0130_10_serena/2501_0701_02_10:
After all, being unique from everyone else is
something I value a lot...
ch0130_10_serena/2501_0701_03_10:
But now, I’ve come to learn that doing things
together with others can be a valuable
experience, too.
ch0130_10_serena/2501_0702_01_10: I’m so grateful for my friends—including you!
ch0130_10_serena/2501_0702_02_10:
Everyone I’ve met has helped shape me into who
I am today.
ch0130_10_serena/2511_0701_01_10:
Hey, did you know that Zygarde can
change forms?
ch0130_10_serena/2511_0701_02_10: It’s like a fashion show! So cool, right?
ch0130_10_serena/2511_0701_03_10:
Wouldn’t it be awesome if Trainers could change
their appearance during battle, too?
ch0130_10_serena/2511_0702_01_10:
Instead of saying “I wish I could,” I should just
make it happen!
ch0130_10_serena/2511_0702_02_10:
If there’s something you wanna do, you have to be
the one to take the initiative.
ch0130_10_serena/3001_0701_01_10:
When I make myself look good in the morning,
I feel ready to take on the world! It’s all about
getting in the right mindset.
ch0130_10_serena/3003_0701_01_10:
I just love getting compliments when I wear my
favorite outfits. It brightens my whole day.
ch0130_10_serena/3005_0701_01_10:
Sometimes, when I look up at the stars at night,
I start to miss my mom a little... Maybe I should
give her a call soon.
